department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement for 2 antenna reception systems and any related components to deliver within 120 days
description: Delivery of 2 antenna reception systems and any related components to the designated warehouse of ECCC within 120 days of contract award. Optional delivery of 2 additional antenna reception systems and any related components within 180 days of contract award. Each bidder must clearly demonstrate compliance with the mandatory technical criteria in the Request for Proposal document.
full_summary:
# RFP for Antenna Systems
### Tender Details
* Reference: WS4077356904-DO4215462821
* Solicitation Number: WS4077356904
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: 15 September 2023
* Tender Closing Date: 19 October 2023, 14:00 EST

### Expected Contract Timeline
* Expected Contract Start Date: 28 March 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 30 March 2026

### Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Description
This tender solicits bids for the delivery of Antenna Systems as per the following specifications:
* 2 Antenna Reception Systems and related components
* Option to deliver 2 additional Antenna Reception Systems and related components within 180 days
* Tender Requirements: Mandatory technical criteria must be clearly demonstrated by bidders

### Resources
* Affected End-User Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Allison Fernandez
	+ Email: allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Telephone: Not Available

### Links and Attachments
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17464785?extsite=MTc0NjQ3ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Mandatory Supportive Documentation and Bid Submission Due Date: 05 October 2023, 14:00 EST

### Important Clarification
Due to an amendment to the response deadline closing time, all bidders are required to disregard the original response deadline closing time posted on Ariba Discovery. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on the date and time specified above. Any late submissions will be declared non-responsiative.

Estimated Time: 0.67 hours
